# ct-toggle

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description             | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disables the toggle     | `boolean` | `false` |
| `toggled`  | `toggled`  | The value of the toggle | `boolean` | `false` |

## Methods

### `toggle() => Promise<void>`

Toggles the toggle state

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void>`
